reviewText: I certainly enjoyed these two movies for their realistic nature.  Besides the reality behind them, I also enjoyed the thrill apparent in each of these two movies.  Each of these movies provided enough thrill factor to last a good while.
summary: These two movies are of a realistic nature that appeals to me, hence my decisions to own them.
Title: Lies My Mother Told Me / Widow on the Hill

reviewText: Wow, you get two great movies for one low price. Can't believe that people could actually behave this way. Would love to know if the daughters won their law suit in" Widow On The Hill".
Title: Lies My Mother Told Me / Widow on the Hill

reviewText: great movies especially widow on the hill loved it it was totaly awesome i highly recommend this movie it is very interesting cunning you name it thanks
summary: lies my mother told me plus widow on the hill.
Title: Lies My Mother Told Me / Widow on the Hill

reviewText: i have this movie and i think its one of lifetime better of the movies but lifetime has may good movies this was very good .
Title: Lies My Mother Told Me / Widow on the Hill

reviewText: Very good movie, filled willed lot's of suspense. Glad I have it added to my collection. Hayden Pantierrie was excellent in this movie.
Title: Lies My Mother Told Me / Widow on the Hill

reviewText: Just my opinion.......As a two pack of movies...this pack is GREAT!!You know sometimes you get a pack and one is good and the other sucks? Well this is not the case. A must have for Lifetime fans!
Title: Lies My Mother Told Me / Widow on the Hill

reviewText: I like watching true stories and these movies were interesting.  I thought that Lies My Mother Told Me was well acted.  I enjoyed the other movie also.
summary: I like both of these movies
Title: Lies My Mother Told Me / Widow on the Hill

reviewText: A sexy young hospice nurse (Natasha Henstridge), is hired by a wealthy man (James Brolin) to care for his sick wife who eventually dies. When the nurse becomes the widower's new bride and then he dies suspiciously leaving his vast fortune to the new Mrs., his daughter becomes convinced that her gold-digging stepmother is up to no good and could be a murderess.
Title: Lies My Mother Told Me / Widow on the Hill
